message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $175. This is a one-time offer, so let me know if you're interested!

Hi Alice, thanks for the offer!  I appreciate you reaching out.  $175 is a bit out of my budget right now. Would you be willing to go down to $125? I'm really interested in the product, but I just can't go higher than that.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer! I understand that $125 is a bit of a stretch for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $150, which is the lowest I can go. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'd be happy to make a deal!
